sentences.english: Playing music so loudly that it annoys neighbours is antisocial.
sentences.chinese: 大聲放音樂騷擾四鄰是破壞社會安寧。

sentences.english: No one in the neighbouring flats was unawakened by the noise.
Joe gathered the boys and girls of the neighbourhood for a picnic.
sentences.chinese: 喬把街坊四鄰的男孩和女孩們集合起來去野餐。

sentences.english: It asks us the teahouse as the centre of the neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 它叫我們茶館作爲街坊四鄰的活動中心。

sentences.english: Burnt to cinders, we were told by the neighbourhood gossips.
sentences.chinese: 我們從街坊四鄰的閒言碎語中得知他被燒成了灰。

sentences.english: I don't mean to complain, but you're keeping all the neighbors up.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有抱怨的意思，不過，你搞得四鄰都睡不着。

sentences.english: The four-part formula gives the relation between two angles and the two sides adjacent to them around the spherical triangle.
sentences.chinese: 四鄰公式爲環繞球面三角的兩邊及兩角關係式。

sentences.english: I want to show you the neighbourhood this morning .
sentences.chinese: 今天早上，我想帶你看看周圍四鄰。

sentences.english: They were always very suspicious about their neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 他們總是對四鄰存有疑心。

sentences.english: It asks us to see the teahouse as the center of the neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 《茶館》讓我們茶館作爲街坊四鄰的活動中心。

sentences.english: The noise upset the entire neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 噪聲鬧得整個街坊四鄰心煩意亂。

sentences.english: The fire alarmed all the neighbors on the street.
sentences.chinese: 火災使整個街坊四鄰都驚恐起來。

definition: to chat with a low voice
(of animals, the wind etc) to make a mournful sound/whine/moan/wail
